m.marble-sense: אַיִן:002002002006:Non-Exist;002002003004:Non-Happen:there is no;there is not;it is not;it does not
זכר:002004002007:Know:to remember;to call to mind;to be mindful;to bear in mind;to consider
אמר:002004001009008:Speak:to say;to speak;to tell;to command;to think;to call
יתר:002002002005:Exist:to cause to remain;to leave over
חרף:002001002026:Shame:to reproach;to taunt;to insult;to defy;to blaspheme
